title: Lulu Unable to AA while Help, Pix! is Active on Ally
body:
So! I decided to play Lulu with the Bittersweet skin. Later in the game, whenever I put Help, Pix! on my allied Miss Fortune, I found myself unable to auto attack while Miss Fortune was auto attacking. My autos would stagger as Pix would shoot bolts quickly due to MF's fast attack speed. 

It happened when MF activated her Impure Shots and had around 1.87 attack speed, but it also happened when I cast Pix on Shen as he attacked Baron.  As long as Pix was shooting his bolts at/above a certain speed, I was unable to actually connect my auto attacks to a target.

replies.body:
Hey Sasunto,

Thanks for the report! We're looking into this now.

Hello!

I was also in the custom game and can also confirm the bug is reproducible. Lulu cannot AA when **Help, Pix!** is cast on an alli champion ~~attacking the same target as Lulu~~.

Here is videos of the bug at...

**Dragon**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Z5GZbkvSC8

**Baron**
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lE-AnWiLnSU

**On a random champ's (aka my) face**
https://youtu.be/SzdKoOx5WT8

Here is also another video from a forum search showing it clearer
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n37nQgGQ6uE

Just got out of a custom game to test it, was able to reproduce the bug. Lulu just twitches and her autos are canceled. Especially evident when both of us had 2.0+ attack speed. Lulu couldn't get a single auto off on enemy champions/baron/dragon.
Wow, I've had that issue for months and thought it was lag. :l
